meanings.definition: The fact or state of happening or existing.
meanings.sent1: The occurrence of rain made the flowers grow.
meanings.sent2: A sudden occurrence of thunder startled the children.
meanings.sent3: The occurrence of a clown at the library caused laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an occurrence of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The occurrence of a shooting star left a lasting impression on the young boy.

meanings.definition: An instance of something happening or existing.
meanings.sent1: The strange occurrence of a cat in the classroom surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: Each occurrence of a bell ringing signaled the end of a class.
meanings.sent3: The occurrence of a squirrel stealing a sandwich was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His arrival was an occurrence that brightened her day like a rainbow after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The occurrence of a rainbow after the rain brought smiles to all who saw it.
